channel.title: 3 questions
channel.description: Hey im using a delta source and i teleted into the lvl like 20 wildy nad it didnt have multicombat sign (there are none on the whole server but thats ok) but i tryed it anyway and it is multi but everytime you killsomeone you dc...? [b][i][size=36pt]EDIT:[/size][/i][/b] also, my wepons (rune cbow ags whip dds and like all of them) hit super super high, so i go in and change the stats but they still hit pretty good. i never changed the armour i was wondering if i could do it an easier way. ALSO my monsters dont hit on me?

item.title: 3 questions
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Use a try and catch block to try and catch the thrown exception, of when the player disconnects. You’re probably sending a malformed packet.

Read full topic
